Package com.mySTARS.Entities

Class StudentAccount

java.lang.Object
com.mySTARS.Entities.Account
com.mySTARS.Entities.StudentAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class StudentAccount
extends Account
Holds information of student account and also student information. Inherits Account class.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentAccount

      public StudentAccount​(java.lang.String loginID, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, StudentInformation studentInfo, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> coursesRegistered, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> courseOnWaitList, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> courseHistory)
      Constructor for making a student account. Takes in basic information of student and its account details to make an account Also holds information on the courses that they students are registering for or those already taken.
      Parameters:
      loginID - The username used to access an account that is registered under MySTARS
      password - The password that is tagged respectively under the respective account.
      email - The email address that is tagged respectively under the respective account
      studentInfo - contains the studentInfo object.
      coursesRegistered - A list of course registered
      courseOnWaitList - A list of course on the waitList
      courseHistory - A list of course previously taken.

  • Method Details

    • addToRegisteredCourse

      public boolean addToRegisteredCourse​(int index_in)
      Add index to registered course. Return false if the course is already taken, registered, or on the waitlist.
      Parameters:
      index_in - index of course to be added
      Returns:
      returns a boolean if the course can be added or not

    • addToWaitList

      public boolean addToWaitList​(int index_in)
      Add index to wait list. Return false if the course is already taken, registered, or on the waitlist.
      Parameters:
      index_in - index of course to be added
      Returns:
      return boolean if adding to waitlist is successful

    • isTakingCourse

      public boolean isTakingCourse​(int index)
      Check if the student is currently registered for a current index.
      Parameters:
      index - index of course to be checked
      Returns:
      boolean on if student is currently taking the course.

    • makeAccount

      public static StudentAccount makeAccount​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.String nationality, java.lang.String matricNo)
      Class static Method to make account Takes in all required parameters and return a full StudentAcount.
      Parameters:
      login - The username used to access an account that is registered under MySTARS
      password - The password that is tagged respectively under the respective account.
      email - The email address that is tagged respectively under the respective account
      name - Name of student
      gender - Gender of student
      nationality - Nationality of student
      matricNo - Matriculation number of student
      Returns:
      Return student account made.
